text: This course seem to be bugged. I have it in a playlist and from time to time it becomes 'locked' content because I don't have permissions to view it
Okay, thank you for flagging. I will let the team know.
Again, you must make sure you're in your partner account to view the course, even if it's in a playlist

<@U02227D27V3> you are right, just as the message I got in the Academy. However, switching to the right account from the Academy will redirect you to the HubSpot app environment. If you navigate directly back to .e.g. your playlist, the selected account will be reset. I managed to change my account by navigating to <https://app-eu1.HubSpot.com/academy/> instead of the 'my learning' section that I had in my history.

I see now why, <http://app.HubSpot.com/academy/{digitsGoHere}/mylearning|app.HubSpot.com/academy/{digitsGoHere}/mylearning> is a dynamic link that is linked to the account. I somehow managed to bookmark the wrong link when I started my courses last month
